Name: Sight-seeing buses that offer tour narratin to provide such narration from a live sight-seeing guide.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city administrative code in relation to requiring sight-seeing buses that offer tour narration to provide such narration from a live sight-seeing guide.

History.Description: This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Subchapter 21 of chapter 2 of Title 20 of the New York city administrative code is hereby amended by adding new section 376.1 to read as follows:
20-376.1  Tour narration on sight-seeing buses.  Any sight-seeing bus licensed pursuant to this subchapter  that offers tour narration shall provide such narration from a live sight-seeing guide licensed pursuant to subchapter 8 of this title.  Tour narration shall not be provided on a video tape, audio tape, compact disc, or through any other digital, electronic, computerized or similar means.
Â§2.  This local law shall take effect 90 days after its enactment. 


9/14/02
